search_result.link_content_summary:
{
"Summary": "Bell & Evans is a family owned and operated natural foods company that puts an emphasis on quality over quantity. They are the oldest branded chicken company in America and they are looking to add to their 1,800 member team. The company has many benefits for its employees, including:\n\n* Competitive pay\n* Full-time schedule\n* Great health benefits and on-site wellness clinics\n* Athletic trainers for on-site occupational health\n* Employee store with discount on Bell & Evans products\n* State-of-the-art facilities and the latest technology",
"Company Name": "Bell & Evans",
"Email": "None",
"Phone Number": "717-865-1121",
"Address": "520 Chestnut Hill Rd\nFredericksburg, PA 17026",
"Product Information": "Bell & Evans sells premium, high-quality chicken.",
"Representative": "None",
"Useful Information": "Bell & Evans has 100% of their operations located in Fredericksburg, Pennsylvania.  As they continue to grow, opportunities for advancement are endless!"
}

search_result.link_content_summary:
{
 "Summary": "Bell & Evans es una empresa innovadora en la industria alimentaria natural desde 1890. Su misión es brindar la mejor calidad de vida a sus empleados y sus familias. La empresa está ubicada en Fredericksburg, Pensilvania y ofrece una variedad de beneficios a sus empleados, que incluyen pago competitivo, horario a tiempo completo, excelentes beneficios de salud, entrenadores de atletas en el lugar de trabajo y oportunidades de avance infinitas.",
 "Company Name": "Bell & Evans",
 "Email": "None",
 "Phone Number": "717-865-6626",
 "Address": "154 West Main Street\nFredericksburg, PA 17026",
 "Product Information": "La empresa produce pollo de primera calidad, sin productos básicos, manteniendo los más altos estándares de bienestar animal en su industria.",
 "Representative": "None",
 "Useful Information": "Bell & Evans es un empleador de igualdad de oportunidades."
}

search_total_info:
- Buyer overview
Company Name: Farmers Pride, Inc.
Representative: Scott Sechler
Product: Poultry processing
Website: www.bellandevans.com 

- Buyer's recent activities 
Product info : Bell & Evans sells premium, high-quality chicken.. La empresa produce pollo de primera calidad, sin productos básicos, manteniendo los más altos estándares de bienestar animal en su industria. 
Useful info : Bell & Evans has 100% of their operations located in Fredericksburg, Pennsylvania.  As they continue to grow, opportunities for advancement are endless!. Bell & Evans es un empleador de igualdad de oportunidades.. - Sign up for our Newsletter
- View Newsletter Archive. 1. The website contains a blog with articles on various topics related to chicken, including recipes, cooking tips, and safety advice.
2. The website has a section called "Our Standards" that outlines the company's commitment to animal welfare, organic farming, and other ethical practices.
3. The website has a section called "Get the Facts" that provides answers to frequently asked questions about the company and its products.. The company's website also includes the following useful information:
- A link to a machine-readable file (MRF) for in-network and out-of-network allowed amounts for Bell & Evans current health plan, as required by the Departments of Labor, Treasury and Health and Human Services Departments’ Transparency in Coverage Rule (TCR).
- A list of the company's registered trademarks.
- A form for signing up for the company's newsletter.
- A link to the Newsletter Archive.
